scripts.say: When I arrived at the office, my secretary, Hiei, had already started working.
Oh my, Commander? I'm terribly sorry for not waking you up sooner.
But when I reflected upon how hard you work every day, I thought you deserved to sleep 10 more minutes.
Not at all, it's only natural to look out after you as your secretary ship.
However... I'd appreciate it if you could keep this a secret from the others.
Especially from Haruna and Kongou... If they heard about this, I'd get an earful for "pampering the Commander too much."
Anyway, the tea is now ready. Please do enjoy it.
As expected of someone who studied abroad with the Royal Navy. Hiei's skill at making tea was easily on par with that of the Royal girls.
... Since you're done, I'll now go over today's itinerary.
First, here is the inventory for our commission rewards, as well as a roster for today's training exercises...
And here are the material and equipment orders from the research lab.
Hiei's itinerary and reports were flawless as usual. However, there was something I was concerned about...
Hm? What's the matter, Commander? Oh my, is there something stuck on my cheek?
For whatever reason, Hiei seemed to be in an especially good mood.
